frameDefinitions: In this frame either a Stimulus brings about a particular emotion or experience in the Experiencer or  saliently fails to bring about a particular experience.
The words of this frame describe how a Resource_controller spends money or other Resources for a particular purpose .
A Person or Institution is being described in terms of their wealthiness, in other words the amount of money in their possession.
An Earner receives Earnings by providing Goods to a Buyer; providing the Goods also generally entails a cost, which may or may not be included in the consideration.
An Entity is in a state such that it participates in a preponderance of states and events which are desirable for it.
A Political_region, often a nation,  has an economic system, theEconomy, defined by the level of production and consumption of goods and services.
frameExamples: This reflects the 15 % jump in <t><fex name='Earnings'>earnings</fex></t> over 1994 .
In the 1920s the peach industry <t>flourished</t> in Upson County.
The Canadian <t><fex name='Economy'>economy</fex></t> will continue to expand in 2005.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the object or event which brings about the emotion in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.

The <fen>Resource_controller</fen> is the individual whose frugality or generosity is being described. Person typically occurs as the External Argument or, in some cases when <fen>Behavior</fen> is also expressed, in an <ment>of</ment>-PP:
Some specific <fen>Behavior</fen> may be described as frugal or extravagant, rather than attributing the characteristic directly to the <fen>Resource_controller</fen>.
This role is the resource which the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> expends.
The individual or individuals whose wealthiness is being described.
A group which has (or lacks) possession of some resource.
The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.
<fen>Earnings</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The <t>Entity</t> is experiencing a period of desirable events or states.
This role describes the state of the <fen>Entity</fen>. It is often incorporated into the LUs of this frame.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the thriving takes place.
The <fen>Political_region</fen> is the nation, state, or other political body within which an economic system exists.
The <fen>Economy</fen> is the state of the <fen>Political_region</fen> as defined by the production, consumption, etc. of goods and services.
listRoleExamples: It's thrifty of Jo <fex>to re-use teabags</fex>.
<fex>Pat and Kim</fex> are completely broke at the moment.
She made a lot of money <fex>in Africa</fex> .
In the 1920s <fex>the peach industry</fex> thrived in Upson County.
He was living <fex>well</fex> after his promotion.
<fex>In the 1920s</fex> the peach industry thrived in Upson County.
Why was it that democracy flourished <fex>in America</fex>?

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the University of Maryland University College
